comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
The 1914 Yale Class Day commemorated the 20th anniversary reunion of the Class of 1894 and (if one is to believe the banner) all classes before that as well, all the way back to 1492 (when Columbus discovered America).

Other Bain/LOC photos of 1914 Yale Class Day activities:
